name: Cubed (Greg the martian)
description: Thanks for taking the game :), this is made by me Our Primary Builds are the Mac, Windows,And the Web One.As for linux, I am not sure about it I just took all the file 93I thought  were part of line and kept in a folder,I would try it out to see if it works, if not you can use our web-version. If possible please report this to Fruity Animation#0637 on discord.And chromeOS users Unity doesn't port to you uhh so ummm just use the web version I guess,RIP chromeOS users, use web. If Web dosent work use a diffrent browser.
